1.title: Which gender into futa

11.content: Ok so which male character turns futa
11.title: Male to Futa

111.content: Now how will the famous hero become a busty and well hung Futanari?
111.title: Sonic the Hedgehog

1112.content: So how does Eggman do it?
1112.title: Eggman's new "Stop, Sonic, Scheme"

11121.content:
"Hahaha! With this ray-gun, I shall turn Sonic into dust!" Dr. Eggman laughed in his lab. "Yes! This will be perfect! He'll be turned into nothing and won't be able to stop me at all!"

Charging his newest device until it was fully charged and pulsing with energy, he marvelled at his engineering before quickly dashing out of his base; in search of his adversary.

"Let's go find him..." He said in a very sinister tone. Eventually Eggman found Sonic relaxing at a beach.

"Perfect, he'll never see it coming."

There from a safe distance in the sky, Eggman ready his ray-gun and fired at Sonic who was too occupied with his radio to notice a strange beam of light that was speeding towards him. The beam flashed Sonic and instantly engulfed him with the light, Eggman snickering at his handy work and instantly flew away; knowing his plan was already a success.

Humming to his tunes with his eyes closed, Sonic didn't notice something felt off and strange tingling all over his body.
11121.title: Classic Raygun

12.content: So which girl get's turned into a futa?
12.title: Female to Futa

info.brief_description: Take the Sonic Characters, turn them into futa's, see how they cope with their new gender
info.description:
Take the sonic characters and turn them into futa's. Creativity is the key it can happen however you want but there are a few rules.

No male on male action, fut on male is ok just don't expect any from me
Female on Female is fine as for why this is fine but Male on Male isn't that's just not my sexual preference... at all
No killing, characters cannot be killed whatsoever, they can be removed but not outright killed
No Scat, Urine, or Toilet Sex just no, not a fetish that I find in any way arousing.
Domination is fine
You can turn a guy into a girl and a girl into a guy that's fine.

Other than that anything goes
